newsitem.title: USA: America West matches American cuts.
newsitem.headline: America West matches American cuts.

text.p: America West Airlines said it matched matched a fare reduction launched by American Airlines on March 29.
Travelers could book sales fares through April 14 for travel in most domestic markets, the company said.
Travel could begin as early as April 7 and had to be completed by May 5, it said. Some restrictions applied.
American is a unit of AMR Corp. It said it cut fares up to 50 percent on most domestic routes through May 5.
